name: Entomophobia Episode 1
description:
The year is 2049.
Earth's population has gotten out of control. Within ten years there will be more people than crops available to sustain them. The world is in crisis. RenGen Corp has set up project Harvest, an outer space experimental facility designed to facilitate a way to grow crops larger and faster.  The mission was a success but during their experiments they also found a way to accelerate the growth of insects. 

Game Controls

ActionGame BoyKeyboardMoveD-PadArrow KeysAction ButtonAZStatisticsBXView MapStartEnter

This game intended to be played on a Game Boy.
Physical copies available to buy soon!
